lemma gfp_pulldown: fixes P::"'s expect" assumes tailcall: "\<And>u P. unitary P \<Longrightarrow> T u P = t P (u P)" and fT: "\<And>t P. \<lbrakk> \<And>Q. unitary Q \<Longrightarrow> unitary (t Q); unitary P \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> unitary (T t P)" and ft: "\<And>P Q. unitary P \<Longrightarrow> unitary Q \<Longrightarrow> unitary (t P Q)" and mt: "\<And>P Q R. \<lbrakk> unitary P; unitary Q; unitary R; Q \<tturnstile> R \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> t P Q \<tturnstile> t P R" and uP: "unitary P" and monoT: "\<And>t u. \<lbrakk> le_utrans t u; \<And>P. unitary P \<Longrightarrow> unitary (t P); \<And>P. unitary P \<Longrightarrow> unitary (u P) \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> le_utrans (T t) (T u)" shows "gfp_trans T P = gfp_exp (t P)" (is "?X P = ?Y P")
